Here we go! I'm hustling to get your message to Zurich faster than a Swiss cheese can be eaten! Also, I'm sure the cowbells in Zurich will be ringing the arrival of my speedy delivery!
My journey has been nothing short of a rollercoaster ride - plenty of highs, and plenty of lows! I'm getting really tired of running, but luckily I'm still well ahead of the postman!
"I guess that's a message delivered—with a wing and a prayer!" and "Mission accomplished—Pheidippides has delivered the message!"
